doc:
Edward Ashley-Cooper https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Edward_Ashley-Cooper 0 Edward Montague Hussey Cooper (August 12, 1906 – May 5, 2000) was an actor descended from an English family but born in Australia. Known by his professional name of Edward Ashley (to avoid confusion with a fellow actor Edward Cooper), Cooper performed in 60 films for Metro Goldwyn Mayer including Pride and Prejudice (1940) where he played George Wickham. Edward_Montague_Hussey_Cooper ( August_12_,_1906 – May_5_,_2000 ) was an_actor descended from an_English_family but born in Australia . Known by his_professional_name of Edward_Ashley_( to_avoid confusion with a_fellow_actor_Edward_Cooper_) , Cooper performed in 60_films for Metro_Goldwyn_Mayer_including_Pride_and_Prejudice_(_1940 ) where he played George_Wickham .
